mapper.sql: id, name, organization_code, cluster_id, version_id, host_id, k8s_id, docker_id, coss_ref_bucket, env_type, enable, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag

i.id, i.name, i.organization_code, i.cluster_id, i.version_id, i.host_id, i.k8s_id, i.docker_id, i.coss_ref_bucket, i.env_type, i.enable, i.remark, i.create_by, i.create_date, i.update_by, i.update_date, i.del_flag

d.id as 'd.id', d.name as 'd.name', d.organization_code as 'd.organization_code', d.master_addr as 'd.master_addr', d.create_date as 'd.create_date', d.create_by as 'd.create_by', d.update_date as 'd.update_date', d.update_by as 'd.update_by', d.del_flag as 'd.del_flag'
mapper.select: select ,h.hostname,c.endpoint, c.deploy_type, from erm_app_instance i left join erm_host h on h.id = i.host_id left join erm_app_cluster c on c.id=i.cluster_id left join erm_docker_cluster d on d.id = i.docker_id where i.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from erm_app_instance where cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag!=1
select ,h.hostname from erm_app_instance i left join erm_host h on h.id = i.host_id where i.cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and i.env_type = #{envType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.del_flag!=1
select count(1) from erm_app_instance where cluster_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag!=1
mapper.insert: insert into erm_app_instance (id, name,organization_code, cluster_id, version_id, host_id, k8s_id, docker_id, coss_ref_bucket, env_type, enable, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{serverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hostId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{k8sId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{dockerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cossRefBucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{envType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update erm_app_instance
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
host_id = #{hostId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
k8s_id = #{k8sId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
docker_id = #{dockerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
coss_ref_bucket = #{cossRefBucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
env_type = #{envType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update erm_app_instance set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, host_id = #{hostId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, k8s_id = #{k8sId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, docker_id = #{dockerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coss_ref_bucket = #{cossRefBucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, env_type = #{envType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
